text:
[Verse 1]
Neon skies above me
City lights all aglow
Walking through the shadows
Heart that starts to grow

[Verse 2]
Dancing on the pavement
Stars can see us here
Whispers in the nighttime
Dreams become so clear

[Chorus]
Midnight city's calling
We'll dance until the dawn
Lights that keep on shining
We'll never feel alone

[Verse 3]
Rooftops we are climbing
Night is our domain
Laughing in the moonlight
Feel the sweet refrain

[Verse 4]
Sirens sing a love song
Echoes in the night
Together we'll keep dancing
In the glow of city lights

[Bridge]
Every step a heartbeat
Every beat a song
We can hear it calling
It’s where we belong
title: Midnight City Lights
